## OIT.begin() method

Begins rendering the transparent objects.

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract begin(ctx: DrawContext): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ctx | [DrawContext](doc/markdown/./scene.drawcontext.md) | The draw context. |

**Returns:**

number

The number of passes required for rendering.
